body:
## :scroll: Run `clang-format` on the following files - [ ] src\demo.cpp - [ ] src\demo.hpp --- ## :speech_balloon: Output from `clang-tidy`
src\demo.cpp
C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Enterprise\VC\Tools\MSVC\14.32.31326\include\yvals_core.h:599:2: error: [clang-diagnostic-error] > STL1000: Unexpected compiler version, expected Clang 13.0.0 or newer.

```.h #error STL1000: Unexpected compiler version, expected Clang 13.0.0 or newer. ^ ```

src\demo.cpp:6:8: warning: [modernize-use-trailing-return-type] > use a trailing return type for this function

```.cpp size_t dummyFunc(size_t i) { return i; } ~~~~~~ ^ auto -> size_t ```

src\demo.cpp:8:5: warning: [modernize-use-trailing-return-type] > use a trailing return type for this function

```.cpp int main() ~~~ ^ auto -> int ```

src\demo.cpp:10:13: warning: [readability-braces-around-statements] > statement should be inside braces

```.cpp for (;;) ^ { ```

src\demo.cpp:13:5: warning: [cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-vararg] > do not call c-style vararg functions

```.cpp printf("Hello world!\n"); ^ ```

src\demo.hpp
src\demo.hpp:10:11: warning: [modernize-use-trailing-return-type] > use a trailing return type for this function

```.hpp void *not_usefull(char *str){ ~~~~~~^ auto -> void * ```

src\demo.hpp:12:16: warning: [modernize-use-nullptr] > use nullptr

```.hpp return 0; ^ nullptr ```
